CodonU.analyzer.enc_comp¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

calculate_enc(→ float | dict[str, float])

Calculates ENc value for a given sequences
CodonU.analyzer.enc_comp.calculate_enc(records, genetic_code_num: int, min_len_threshold=200, gene_analysis: bool = False) → float | dict[str, float]¶

Calculates ENc value for a given sequences

Parameters:

  • records – The generator object containing sequence object

  • genetic_code_num – Genetic table number for codon table

  • min_len_threshold – Minimum length of nucleotide sequence to be considered as gene

  • gene_analysis – Option if gene analysis (True) or genome analysis (False) (optional)

Returns:

The ENc value or a dictionary containing gene number and corresponding ENc value
